and.name: File_Explorer
and.description: A simple file explorer that shows directories and files of an operation system

feature.name: Open_File
feature.description: Opens a selected or multiply selected files with the associated program. E.g. a .txt will be opened by the default text editor of the os.

feature.name: Create_File
feature.description: Creates a blank file with no extension (Linux) or *.txt on Windows.

feature.name: Delete_File
feature.description: Deletes an existing file from saved location

feature.name: Rename_File
feature.description: Provides the abillity to rename an existing file

and.name: Search
and.description: Provides a search algorithm to search for files or for text in files

feature.name: FindIn_Files
feature.description: Finds text files where a by user input given text occurs

feature.name: Find_File
feature.description: Finds all files defined by the user given search spattern (RegEx)

feature.name: Change_File_Permission
feature.description: Provides the abillity to change file permission e.g. set read/write/executable flags for a file

feature.name: FIle_Preview
feature.description: Shows a preview of the file directly in the explorer. Only works for images and text files

feature.name: Hidden_Files_Visibillity
feature.description: Change the visibillity of hidden files

or.name: Move_File
or.description: Allows to move files from on directory to another

feature.name: Copy_File
feature.description: Creates a copy of selected files into another directory

feature.name: Cut_File
feature.description: Creates a copy of selected files into another directory and delete them afterwards in the old location

feature.name: Create_Folder
feature.description: Creates an empty folder

feature.name: Delete_Folder
feature.description: Deletes a folder even if it contains subfolders or files

feature.name: Rename_Folder
feature.description: Provides the abillity to rename an existing directory

feature.name: Change_Folder_Permission
feature.description: Provides the abillity to change file permission e.g. set read/write/executable flags for a directory

feature.name: Hiden_Folder_Visibillity
feature.description: Change the visibillity of hidden files

and.name: Move_Folder
and.description: Allows to move folder from on directory to another

feature.name: Copy_Folder
feature.description: Creates a copy of selected folders into another folder

feature.name: Cut_Folder
feature.description: Creates a copy of selected folders into another folder and deletes them afterwards in the old location

and.name: Devices
and.description: Files and Folders are saved on physical devices. This feature represents those.

feature.name: Partiotions_Harddrive
feature.description: Shows all available harddrives/partitions

feature.name: USB
feature.description: Shows all available usb devices

feature.name: Disc
feature.description: Shows all available disc devices

feature.name: Network
feature.description: Shows all available harddrives/partitions from network

feature.name: Dropbox
feature.description: Shows folders from a remote dropbox cloud

and.name: Sorting
and.description: Provides an algorithm to sort directories and / or files when displayed

feature.name: Ascending
feature.description: Show folders/files in an ascending sorting

feature.name: Descending
feature.description: Show folders/files in an descending sorting

and.name: UI
and.description: The UI is used for the user to interact and to manage his folders and files easilly.

feature.name: Tabs
feature.description: Tabs provides multiple views of different folders.

feature.name: Favorites
feature.description: Shows a list with commun folders in order to make navigation much easier

or.name: View
or.description: Folders and files can be viewed in several different ways. This feature gives the abillity to switch and use them

feature.name: Tree
feature.description: Shows folders and files in a tree structure with small icons

feature.name: Detail
feature.description: Show folders and files in a list with detailled descriptions and small icon

feature.name: Icon
feature.description: Show folders and files with a big icon and just the name

feature.name: Columns
feature.description: Show files with a big icon and the name in multiply columns

or.name: Theme
or.description: Make the explorer more personal with user selectable themes

feature.name: Light
feature.description: Provides a light (white, gray) theme

feature.name: Dark
feature.description: Provides a dark theme (dark gray, black)

feature.name: Rights
feature.description: Represants the rights that the current user has
